description: Subtle geometric background pattern for home screen
goal: Add visual interest to plain background
generationPrompt:

ASSET DETAILS:

- Purpose: Add visual interest to plain background

- Style: Geometric shapes in brand colors

VISUAL REQUIREMENTS:

- Primary Colors: #C9A98C (warm beige), #B9906F (brown), #FDFBF7 (cream background)
- Text Color: #1C1C1C (dark charcoal)

SPECIFIC CONTENT:
Subtle geometric pattern with 5-10% opacity, scalable design using brand colors

STYLE GUIDELINES:
- Premium, luxury interior design aesthetic
- Clean, modern, sophisticated look

Generate a high-quality png image that meets these specifications exactly.
